name: Secret of the Ancient Temple
description:
Explore the dungeon!  Unlock its secrets and find the idol hidden at its center.

This game was created for the Godot Game Jam #42.  It is currently still in development, but I wanted to present what I have so far.

This game is designed to be played with either keyboard or an Xbox controller.

Keyboard:

  • Up/Down/Left/Right - Move character
  • I/J/K/L - Move camera
  • Space - Jump
  • X - Act
  • Z - Cancel

Xbox Controller:

  • Left Joystick - Move character
  • Right Joystick, R, L - Move camera
  • A - Jump
  • X - Act
  • B - Cancel
